title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 650.2 - Contingencies relative to approval of corporate dissolutions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 650.2 - Contingencies relative to approval of corporate dissolutions

State Regulations

If the Public Health Council approves the dissolution of
the corporation, such approval shall be contingent upon the approval of the
plan of dissolution and distribution of assets by a court of competent
jurisdiction and the filing of a certified copy of the court order of such
approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
650.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
